name: Biohazards - Infection Crisis
description:
Biohazards...
The world was infected with a heinous virus, and it became a crisis of human extinction.

Destroy the virus with your own hands ...!

More than 100 kinds of weapons, exhilarating shooting.
Customize your weapons freely

- Method of operation -

· Swipe left and right to defeat the enemy within 30 seconds!
· Power up weapons and defeat formidable enemies!
· Gacha gets various weapons! Collect "crystals" and turn gacha free!



Recommended for people who likes...
· People who like shooting games
· People who want to read the impressive story
